DIAttribute.value: (rpad(((((((rpad(Q_PPY_WELLS_FARGO.ACCOUNT_NUMBER, 13, '0') || lpad(Q_PPY_WELLS_FARGO.CHECK_NUMBER, 10, '0')) || lpad(Q_PPY_WELLS_FARGO.AMOUNT, 10, '0')) || rpad(Q_PPY_WELLS_FARGO.ISSUE_DATE, 8, ' ')) || Q_PPY_WELLS_FARGO.VOID_INDICATOR) || lpad(Q_PPY_WELLS_FARGO.PAYEE_TAXID, 30, ' ')) || Q_PPY_WELLS_FARGO.Spaces), 80, ' ') || rpad(Q_PPY_WELLS_FARGO.PAYEENAME, 50, ' '))

DIExpression.expr: (rpad(((((((rpad(Q_PPY_WELLS_FARGO.ACCOUNT_NUMBER, 13, '0') || lpad(Q_PPY_WELLS_FARGO.CHECK_NUMBER, 10, '0')) || lpad(Q_PPY_WELLS_FARGO.AMOUNT, 10, '0')) || rpad(Q_PPY_WELLS_FARGO.ISSUE_DATE, 8, ' ')) || Q_PPY_WELLS_FARGO.VOID_INDICATOR) || lpad(Q_PPY_WELLS_FARGO.PAYEE_TAXID, 30, ' ')) || Q_PPY_WELLS_FARGO.Spaces), 80, ' ') || rpad(Q_PPY_WELLS_FARGO.PAYEENAME, 50, ' '))

DIAttribute.name: ui_mapping_text
DIAttribute.value: '6' ||Q_PPY_BNY_CITY.STATUS_CODE ||rpad( $gCompanyName ,10, ' ') ||rpad( nvl( Q_PPY_BNY_CITY.CITY,''),10,' ') ||lpad( nvl( Q_PPY_BNY_CITY.ACCOUNT_NUMBER,''),10,'0') ||lpad( nvl( Q_PPY_BNY_CITY.TRANS_NUMBER,''),10,'0') ||lpad( nvl( Q_PPY_BNY_CITY.S_AMOUNT,''),10,'0') ||rpad( nvl( Q_PPY_BNY_CITY.ISSUE_DATE,''),6,'0') ||lpad( '',10,' ') ||lpad( '',5,' ') ||lpad( '',37,' ')

DIExpression.expr: (((((((((('6' || Q_PPY_BNY_CITY.STATUS_CODE) || rpad($gCompanyName, 10, ' ')) || rpad(nvl(Q_PPY_BNY_CITY.CITY, ''), 10, ' ')) || lpad(nvl(Q_PPY_BNY_CITY.ACCOUNT_NUMBER, ''), 10, '0')) || lpad(nvl(Q_PPY_BNY_CITY.TRANS_NUMBER, ''), 10, '0')) || lpad(nvl(Q_PPY_BNY_CITY.S_AMOUNT, ''), 10, '0')) || rpad(nvl(Q_PPY_BNY_CITY.ISSUE_DATE, ''), 6, '0')) || lpad('', 10, ' ')) || lpad('', 5, ' ')) || lpad('', 37, ' '))

DIAttribute.name: ui_pasting
DIAttribute.value: lookup_ext([DS_RMDB.DBO.ENTITY,'PRE_LOAD_CACHE','MAX'], [CITY],[NULL],[ENTITY_ID,'=',lookup_ext([DS_RMDB.DBO.ACCOUNT,'PRE_LOAD_CACHE','MAX'], [BANK_EID],[NULL],[ACCOUNT_ID,'=',lookup_ext([DS_RMDB.DBO.FUNDS,'PRE_LOAD_CACHE','MAX'], [ACCOUNT_ID],[NULL],[TRANS_NUMBER,'=',T_PPY_DETAILHOLD.TRANS_NUMBER]) SET ("run_as_separate_process"='no', "output_cols_info"='<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><output_cols_info><col index="1" expression="no"/> </output_cols_info>' )]) SET ("run_as_separate_process"='no', "output_cols_info"='<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><output_cols_info><col index="1" expression="no"/> </output_cols_info>' )]) SET ("run_as_separate_process"='no', "output_cols_info"='<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><output_cols_info><col index="1" expression="no"/> </output_cols_info>' )

DIAttribute.name: ui_where_text
DIAttribute.value: ((((cast(FUNDS.TRANS_NUMBER, 'varchar(10)') = cast(T_PPY_CHECKSNOTVOID.CHECKNUMBER, 'varchar(10)')) AND (T_PPY_CHECKSNOTVOID.ACCOUNT_ID = FUNDS.ACCOUNT_ID)) AND (T_PPY_CHECKSNOTVOID.JOBID = $gJobId)) and nvl( FUNDS.ROLLUP_ID, 0 ) = T_PPY_CHECKSNOTVOID.ROLLUP_ID ) and T_PPY_CHECKSNOTVOID.ROLLUP_ID >0

DIExpression.expr: (((((cast(FUNDS.TRANS_NUMBER, 'varchar(10)') = cast(T_PPY_CHECKSNOTVOID.CHECKNUMBER, 'varchar(10)')) AND (T_PPY_CHECKSNOTVOID.ACCOUNT_ID = FUNDS.ACCOUNT_ID)) AND (T_PPY_CHECKSNOTVOID.JOBID = $gJobId)) AND (nvl(FUNDS.ROLLUP_ID, 0) = T_PPY_CHECKSNOTVOID.ROLLUP_ID)) AND (T_PPY_CHECKSNOTVOID.ROLLUP_ID > 0))

DIAttribute.name: ui_where_text
DIAttribute.value: (cast(FUNDS.TRANS_NUMBER, 'varchar(10)') = cast(T_PPY_CHECKSNOTVOID.CHECKNUMBER, 'varchar(10)')) AND (T_PPY_CHECKSNOTVOID.ACCOUNT_ID = FUNDS.ACCOUNT_ID) AND (T_PPY_CHECKSNOTVOID.JOBID = $gJobId) and T_PPY_CHECKSNOTVOID.INPUT_AMOUNT= ifthenelse($gUSE_MC=0,FUNDS.AMOUNT ,FUNDS.PMT_CURRENCY_AMOUNT) and T_PPY_CHECKSNOTVOID.CHECKDATE = FUNDS.DATE_OF_CHECK and (T_PPY_CHECKSNOTVOID.ROLLUP_ID is null or T_PPY_CHECKSNOTVOID.ROLLUP_ID=0)

DIExpression.expr: ((((((cast(FUNDS.TRANS_NUMBER, 'varchar(10)') = cast(T_PPY_CHECKSNOTVOID.CHECKNUMBER, 'varchar(10)')) AND (T_PPY_CHECKSNOTVOID.ACCOUNT_ID = FUNDS.ACCOUNT_ID)) AND (T_PPY_CHECKSNOTVOID.JOBID = $gJobId)) AND (T_PPY_CHECKSNOTVOID.INPUT_AMOUNT = ifthenelse(($gUSE_MC = 0), FUNDS.AMOUNT, FUNDS.PMT_CURRENCY_AMOUNT))) AND (T_PPY_CHECKSNOTVOID.CHECKDATE = FUNDS.DATE_OF_CHECK)) AND ( ((T_PPY_CHECKSNOTVOID.ROLLUP_ID IS NULL ) OR (T_PPY_CHECKSNOTVOID.ROLLUP_ID = 0)) ))

DIAttribute.name: ui_script_text

DIExpression.expr: lookup_ext([DS_RMDB.DBO.PARMS_NAME_VALUE, 'PRE_LOAD_CACHE', 'MAX'], [ STR_PARM_VALUE ], [ 0 ], [ PARM_NAME, '=', 'USE_MULTI_CURRENCY' ], [ ], [ $gUSE_MC ]) SET("output_cols_info" = '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><output_cols_info><col index="1" expression="no"/> </output_cols_info>', "run_as_separate_process" = 'no')

lookup_ext([DS_RMDB.DBO.CODES, 'PRE_LOAD_CACHE', 'MAX'], [ CODE_ID ], [ 0 ], [ TABLE_ID, '=', lookup_ext([DS_RMDB.DBO.GLOSSARY, 'PRE_LOAD_CACHE', 'MAX'], [ TABLE_ID ], [ 0 ], [ SYSTEM_TABLE_NAME, '=', 'CURRENCY_TYPE' ]) SET("output_cols_info" = '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><output_cols_info><col index="1" expression="no"/> </output_cols_info>', "run_as_separate_process" = 'no') , SHORT_CODE, '=', 'USD', DELETED_FLAG, '=', 0 ], [ ], [ $gCODE_ID ]) SET("output_cols_info" = '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><output_cols_info><col index="1" expression="no"/> </output_cols_info>', "run_as_separate_process" = 'no')

lookup_ext([DS_STAGING.DBO.T_PPY_SETTING, 'PRE_LOAD_CACHE', 'MAX'], [ POSITIVE_PAY_TYPE, ACCOUNTLEN, BANKFORMAT, ACCOUNT_ID, MANUALLYCHANGEDATERANGE, FROM_DATE, TO_DATE, TARGET_FILE, COMPANY_NAME, FILE_FORMAT, DESTINATION_CITY ], [ NULL , NULL , NULL , NULL , NULL , NULL , NULL , NULL , NULL , NULL , NULL ], [ JOBID, '=', $gJobId ], [ ], [ $gPositivePayType, $gAccountNumberLen, $gBankFormat, $gAccountID, $gManuallychangedaterange, $gFromDate, $gToDate, $gFileName, $gCompanyName, $gFileFormat, $gDestinationCity ]) SET("output_cols_info" = '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><output_cols_info><col index="1" expression="no"/> <col index="2" expression="no"/> <col index="3" expression="no"/> <col index="4" expression="no"/> <col index="5" expression="no"/> <col index="6" expression="no"/> <col index="7" expression="no"/> <col index="8" expression="no"/> <col index="9" expression="no"/> <col index="10" expression="no"/> <col index="11" expression="no"/> </output_cols_info>', "run_as_separate_process" = 'no')

DIExpression.expr: ifthenelse((($gDestinationCity IS NOT NULL ) AND ($gDestinationCity != '')), lookup_ext([DS_RMDB.DBO.CODES, 'PRE_LOAD_CACHE', 'MAX'], [ SHORT_CODE ], [ NULL ], [ CODE_ID, '=', $gDestinationCity ]) SET("output_cols_info" = '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><output_cols_info><col index="1" expression="no"/> </output_cols_info>', "run_as_separate_process" = 'no') , NULL )

DIAttribute.name: ObjectDesc
DIAttribute.value: Change the To and from date based on the if $gManullychangedaterange. If $gManullychangedaterange is 1 the user manually entered the data range and we use that if its 0 then we take the last date run and today date for the date range
